name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in building robust distributed systems and handling large datasets in high-traffic environments. Proficient in **Go**, **Kubernetes**, and automated testing frameworks, ensuring high reliability and performance in all deliverables. Skilled at designing and implementing scalable backend architectures, leveraging cloud-native solutions and advanced technologies. Exceptional record of enhancing operational efficiency and delivering automation tools in top-tier firms like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Expertise in developing high-performing APIs and employing AI/ML strategies to optimize services using technologies like **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**, **Flask**) on platforms like **AWS** and **Azure**.
